metadata.dc:title: Modular and compulsory training for Nursing in a Mutual Insurance Company for Work-related Accidents. Virtual training experience. Who is it and what is it for?
metadata.dc:description: This article describes a pioneer experience in modular, compulsory and formal training for health staff who join a Mutual Insurance Company for Work-related Accidents. The advantages and disadvantages of on-line training are also described. The article includes a diagram of the three-year training programme (AU)
metadata.dc:creator: Aquino Olivera, Mario
Arnabat, M
metadata.dc:description: En este artículo se describe una experiencia pionera en la formación modulada, obligatoria y reglada para personal sanitario de nueva incorporación en una Mutua de Accidentes de Trabajo. También se describe las ventajas y desventajas de la formación on line. Se adjunta un esquema gráfico de la formación a tres años (AU)
